Name: Grand Hike
About the game: Go on a unique and unforgettable Hike and discover the old historical forest and it's secrets. Get ready for an calm and relaxing adventure far away from the civilization. What kinds of encounters will your Hike have? Explore Explore the giant forest and come across many different areas and small puzzle like problems. Find what happens what happens when a group of Teenagers find their way to the forest. Relax Graphics of Grand Hike are meant to be easy on the eye. All of the sound effects and ambience sounds are highest quality. Every object in the world of Grand Hike is hand placed and optimized to ensure the player has a great time. Length The length of the Hike depends on the player, But the game will approximately last for 2 hours. Collect Grand Hike hides a lot of secrets. Find a lot of deeply hidden fun secrets & get awarded for them!
